snippet: David Berger, a weight lifter and Cleveland native, was one of the 11 Israeli athletes killed by terrorists at the 1972 Munich Games.
abstract: Box Seats article by Hillel Kuttler recalls weightlifter David Berger, a Cleveland native who was one of the 11 Israeli athletes killed by terrorists at the 1972 Munich Games; holds that the International Olympic Committee’s refusal to memorialize the Munich tragedy at the London Games demonstrates an inability to see the trees for the forest.
lead_paragraph: David Berger, a weight lifter and Cleveland native, was one of the 11 Israeli athletes killed by terrorists at the 1972 Munich Games.

headline.seo: From Darkness of ’72 Munich Olympics, Moments of Clarity
headline.main: From Darkness of Munich Olympics, Moments of Clarity
